item.title: About Gereon
item.description: Gereon Vey is manager of the SAP Emerging Technology Solutions team at SUSE. Gereon has a long history in the SAP ecosystem, especially covering the infrastructure side of SAP software. He has been on the SAP campus for more than 20 years now, and has strong relationships with SAP and other SAP partners. Since joining SUSE in 2020, he has been working as a SAP solution architect, driving virtualization and monitoring projects.
